overview: Michael Lebor was the Founder & CEO of Flower.com Inc. which became one of the largest national e-commerce sellers of online flowers & gifts. He later acquired ABC Target Store Fixtures a prominent mail order store fixture company in the US, which he subsequently merged with M. Fried Store Fixtures to create one of the largest distributors on the East Coast. Mr. Lebor is also a partner in HugeMedium, a boutique internet e-commerce consulting company. He has management and operational experience; his marketing expertise extends throughout all aspects of e-commerce, distribution and fulfillment.
